ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: I have no idea what things sell for on real servers.  I play on test. I was only guessing.  But I have heard of things selling for several thousand plat.  So,
ygData.messageBody:
I have no idea what things sell for on real servers. I play on test.
I was only guessing. But I have heard of things selling for several
thousand plat. So, I assumed that SoO would be right up there.


>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Dwarven Cleric
>Date: Wed, 20 Oct 1999 11:39:18 -0400 (EDT)
>
>I do not know what server you are on but the staff of observers has not
>been worth 1000pp for months on mine.
>
> >
> > Very profitable way to hunt? Sounds like you're exploiting to me. I
> > don't know any 15th level anythings that can shell out the 1000+ pp
> > for an observer staff. That's a lot of greater lightstones and bronze
> > spears.
> >
>
><< text3.html >>
